gamerule.minecraft.ig_magnet_range.descr: The radius (in blocks) within which items and XP orbs are pulled towards the player. Set to 0 to disable.
gamerule.minecraft.ig_magnet_noclip.desc: If enabled, items and XP orbs will be pulled through solid blocks (walls, floors) to reach you.
If enabled, the magnet will also attract Experience Orbs.
gamerule.minecraft.ig_magnet_particles.d: If enabled, items will leave a particle trail while being magnetized towards you.
gamerule.minecraft.ig_magnet_particle_co: The number of particles spawned per tick per entity when pulled. Higher values = denser trails.
gamerule.minecraft.ig_magnet_speed.descr: The pulling speed as a percentage of maximum terminal velocity (1-100). 80 = 80%.
gamerule.minecraft.ig_magnet_acceleratio: How quickly items accelerate towards you (1-100). Higher values mean snappier movement.
